programme.title: General Colin Powell
programme.short_synopsis: How broad is the public appeal of Colin Powell, and could he be a presidential candidate?
programme.medium_synopsis: General Colin Powell's electoral appeal, the apathy towards Republican candidates and a shift in political reporting are discussed by Alistair Cooke.
